adviseScripts.text: ▣□Is this really※necessary, Coun□selor?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: I'm just□▣an ordinary※citizen※who has been rehabilitated.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: Why do you▣▣ insist on putting▣▣ this converter on me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: Because you are still on probation.
Because I'm not confident that I can restrain you if I have to.

Be that as it ▣※may, am I not
□□entitled to my rights?※□ You can let me free and see how I do.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: □▣▣This is※▣absurd. I'm deducting you 10 points.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ※▣□Why would you ever need to※▣□restrain me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: Are you sure this isn't▣□some sick fantasy※of yours?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: Sin and I fight about whether or not she should take off her converter.
※□□Counselor! I think I'm starting to▣※get used※□ to this place.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ▣I had so much fun cutting□□ it up with the Nikkes here yesterday, I had※▣tears coming down my face.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: So that kerfuffle last night was your doing.
I'm glad to hear that you've managed to adjust.

What do you mean※□※kerfuffle?
Don't you think you're being a tad bit※▣negative?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: Personally, I'd call it ※□more of a team-building experience, or a work□▣shop.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: Yeah, everyone here is※▣so nice.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text:
There's always a few rotten eggs who▣※※ act like bullies,
□▣but other than that, this place※□※feels like home now.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: I think ※※bullying should□▣be outlawed!
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: Sin and I talk about what it's like to cohabitate with others.
Coun▣□selor.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text:
If you rescued a ※※kid who was about to drown
▣▣※and they said afterwards that they wanted some Nutrium□, what would you do?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: I'd probably buy them some.
What makes you ask such a random question?
You're a good person,※▣ so I'm not surprised▣□to hear you※say that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: □□I'm just▣※curious about your personality.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: No※▣other reason.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: Personally, I'd buy the kid whatever they wanted.
I□※※see.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ▣※Then how about※※a Nikke who almost drowned?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ※※□And▣what if it wasn't drowning, □※but being locked up in the rehabilitation center?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text:
If you ask me,▣▣※I feel worse for those Nikkes.
□□They're the ones who are most put upon by※society.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: I promise Sin that I'll buy her some Nutrium soon.
※※Let's▣see...
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: □※S is standing pretty at 30 points, R is at minus 6□▣points, E is....
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: Are you calculating points?
What does S and R stand for?
※□Yup.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: □※These are points all earned by risking their▣▣□lives.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text:
If I don't※▣※record it in detail, 
there might be□□a riot....
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: They're the names of some▣※□Nikkes here.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text:
The inmates here※▣aren't assigned numbers□※, so
I'm using initials※▣□ instead.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: I watch Sin allotting points to various Nikkes.
□※▣Counselor, you get along with □the other Nikkes※like a house on fire.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: Everyone▣can't stop□□complimenting you.※▣※
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: How does that make you feel?
Trust me, I'm far from perfect.
As if you had to □▣ask.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ※▣I came here with my bags packed※because I was□ looking for you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: Oh come now□※□, there's no need to▣ be humble.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ▣▣It doesn't leave any room for a Nikke ※to□take care of you...
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: Sin, who seems to be in a good mood, awards me points.
※□What would※ you think of me doing some▣※community service?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: Ever since I was released□※from the rehabilitation center ▣※, I've been wanting to do something that has meaning.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: Okay, let's go together during the weekend.
...You're not up to anything, are you?
Woohoo□※□! Thanks!
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: This way※I can connect with ※▣people who are※going through▣a rough patch.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: I'm sure it'll be fun and▣※※fulfilling in equal measure.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ※▣▣What? Not※□ at all!
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: Just because you have a criminal history doesn't□※mean you can't change...※※
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: What kind of monster▣▣would abuse community service□for their own nefarious means?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: Sin and I look more into what community service we can do.
※▣□Wasn't last week fun※※, Counselor?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text:
□※Every time I think back on ▣※□what you did, 
I bust out※□laughing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: I don't remember.
Last week? Wait, you mean when I...?!
You're pulling my leg, ▣aren't※you?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ▣□▣You said you thought▣it was unfair that I※ was the only one wearing a converter.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text:
So you paraded around※the Outpost□※with a garbage bag over your head ▣※.
Don't tell me you※※don't remember!
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ... I don't. Really.
Well, in that case, there's only one thing we can do.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: □Gather everyone□※▣together and do it one more time!
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ▣□▣You said you thought▣it was unfair that I※ was the only one wearing a converter.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text:
So you paraded around※the Outpost□※with a phone case taped to your mouth ▣※
Don't tell you※※don't remember!
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: I talk about my embarrassing actions a few days prior.
□※▣Quency has been※※coming here often.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ※※I don't mind□it, but security▣here is□ so lax.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: Quency never was one to follow the rules.
Let me know the next time you see Quency.
That's▣※□true.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ▣※※Thanks to her□※,I can ask about how everyone is doing in the center□.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: Huh※□? Why would I do that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ▣▣※We inmates need to have each other's back,□※whether we're in or outside of the center.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text:
If I ratted out※□ every person□I encountered that annoyed me,
who'd want to live□▣ in a world filled with such pettiness?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: I listen to Sin as she tells me about a fellow patient during her time at the center.
□※※Is this whole counseling thing really necessary □▣?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: I've already been□□rehabilitated.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: For your own mental health, it's absolutely necessary.
Should we do something else then?
※□Jeez, I didn't think you were such a※□square.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text:
▣Hardly what I'd▣※call hip and happenin'※□.
15 points penalty!
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: □▣Like what※?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: Anything you want.
□□Hmm... how about you take this converter off※□and we do a little tongue wrestling?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: Sorry, no dice.
Sin and I spend the rest of our session in silence.
□※▣I think everyone ※※needs to take a walk on the wild side※at least once in their life▣.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: □▣If you could commit one sin,▣※what would it be?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: Whichever is the least severe.
Offer a live sacrifice to appease the gods.
You're□※ more of a wuss than I thought▣※□.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ▣※※Someone like you who wants to achieve  ▣□great things should be willing to※□ dabble in the sinful side of life.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: □▣Wow!
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ※□I admire your※brutality.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: I feel like※▣□we're kindred spirits. ▣※ 50 points for you!
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: I speak with Sin about the ethics of sin.
▣Counselor※.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ※▣Would you prefer to be given a ▣※ bar of Splendamin, or a ▣※□light croquette?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: Splendamin.
Croquette.
Good choice. Isn't Splendamin the best?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: Especially ▣※the chocolate-flavored ones.▣※ They're the tastiest, ※and□ the hardest to□ find▣※.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: □※※If I want to become close▣to someone□, I should give them a bar of Splendamin▣※.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: Cro※quette?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: Quency※※said※she prefers※ croquette to※▣□Splendamin as well...
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ▣▣※Is this some kind of croquette▣※conspiracy□?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: Sin and I continue to discuss all things food-related.
It's not□※※that▣today's session isn't enjoyable▣□, but
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ※I'm▣□▣bored out of my gourd.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: Is there something else you'd rather be doing?
Should I give you a piggyback ride?
※□Nothing in※particular.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ▣□▣□It feels like something's... □※missing.※▣※▣I just feel bored, that's all.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ▣▣You don't▣need to worry※.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: You'd※really□do that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ▣□▣I knew□□you're□※□▣a good□person!
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: You □※sure you'll be okay? I'm awfully heavy.□▣※
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: I make an effort to make sure Sin was not bored during our session.
※▣There's a□▣□saying that people take※▣advantage of those who are too nice.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ※Do you※▣think▣※□that's true?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: There's also a saying that luck will find those who live kindly.
I agree somewhat.
※▣Do you※□really▣believe▣that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ▣□I can't agree. ※□Once I left the▣▣rehabilitation center,
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ※▣□more than a few people▣tried to take advantage of my▣kindness.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ▣※□I feel▣the same way□□.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ※No※body□ever takes me seriously□※because I'm▣□▣too nice!
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ※People who live well※tend to be▣□on the nicer side.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ※▣But▣□even they will※have※a bad side to them.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ▣So it's okay※▣to be a bit bad,□※□ don't you think▣?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: I talk about good and evil with Sin.
▣※Counselor,▣□▣who□is the Nikke you're closest to?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ※▣From what I□hear※▣you're close to□everyone.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ... You?
I get along with everyone.
Re※▣ally?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ※I'd say you're my closest friend as well, ※▣right after□Guilty□and Quency※.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: Does□※that make※us□※best▣□friends?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ▣I figured▣※□as much□.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ▣So※▣there's no□▣Nikke□you'd say you're closest to?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: Th※▣※en we should□▣become※▣ closer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: My friendship with Sin deepens.
□It would be▣※※※great if we could have□counseling sessions via text.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: □▣Then▣※I wouldn't feel□misunderstood▣※※.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: I like it when I can see your face.
Would you like to have our next session over text?
Ye□▣ah?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: Then ▣let's just※□keep things as they are□▣.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: □※□□Now that ※□I've given it some more thought,▣▣I guess this is fine.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: Hmm...▣▣ Nah,▣※never mind.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ※※With text□▣※you can't really tell how the□other person is feeling.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: I think□※▣that would lead to just as※※much miscommunication, if not more!
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: Sin and I discuss different potential counseling methods.
Counselor□※▣,
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ※□do you prefer having a▣▣few close friends,
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: Or a wide circle※□of acquaintances▣▣?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: A few close friends.
A wide circle of acquaintances.
□□Closer relationships▣▣can be much more□□rewarding,
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ▣but if they fall apart,※it's hard※to put them back※together again.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: The more you trust someone, the□□ more you feel※□betrayed※if the relationship goes south.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ▣So※I'm a bit reluctant to have deep connections with pe▣ople I know.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: I much prefer having▣a wide social circle※□of people I know, but aren't necessarily overly▣ familiar with.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: □□When it▣comes to helping※someone※□,
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: you're ▣much more inclined to help someone ※□you know versus, say, a complete stranger※.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: Sin and I debate about relationships.
▣□▣How can I※▣form a meaningful connection with□□someone□▣?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ※□Maybe it's□▣because I came※□out from the rehabilitation□▣center,
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ▣□▣but it feels like everyone※□is always▣judging me▣.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: If you want to get close to someone, just talk to them.
Butter them up first with a bar of Splendamin.
※▣Are you□※※sure about that※?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ▣□▣□Whenever I talk to※them※,
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ▣※□□everyone starts ▣□avoiding me before long□※.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: □□Is that really all it takes□to□▣※win people over?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: If※that's how□▣※it is,
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ▣□▣I'll prepare□□some handmade chocolate※Splendamin※.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: Sin and I brainstorm about other ways to win people over.
▣Guilty ▣is※□□upset with me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ▣I made▣fun of her▣and said that she□※texts too slow.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: How▣▣can I□※get her□▣※to not be mad at me anymore?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: Nothing you can do. Just have to wait until she cools off.
Look her straight in the eye and apologize.
□※ That's exactly※▣ what I was planning on▣▣doing!
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ※▣If I just sit back and wait ▣,I won't※exacerbate the situation□※.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ▣I'm sure※▣ she'll be※▣fine once some time passes.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ※If I show myself in front of※Guilty▣▣right now,
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: She may try and break□※every bone□※in my body.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ▣I'll just※wait▣until※※she feels better~!
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: I speak with Sin about Guilty.
▣※□It's so▣▣annoying having to※□blend up all of my meals.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: □※※What▣should I▣do※▣?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ※▣I can't▣starve□※※because of▣this.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ※□Quency▣is too busy, □※※so I don't want to bother her, and Guilty※could crush me like a bug▣if I rub her the wrong way.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: I'll blend your food up for you.
If you starve yourself long enough, you'll be more than willing to blend your food.
You'd do□▣that for me? I felt※※a little bad※□※asking.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: But if※□※you're▣▣volunteering,□▣I won't□▣※refuse!
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: □▣※I'll bring you□▣everything you need for our future counseling sessions.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: I've been※▣starving▣※myself for 12※※hours now.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: Lazi▣※ness will ※□always triumph!
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ▣▣If I starve to death※□then▣▣my death is on your hands!
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: I blend up Sin's food for her during our session.
Coun※selor▣□, what do▣※□you think of ※lying※?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: Gu▣ilty says※there's nothing she despises more than▣※falsehoods.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: Lying is also a skill.
Lying is bad.
That's▣※what I say※.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ※Being a good liar▣□takes a certain amount of intelligence※▣※and wit.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: □□You※seem※pretty□□smart yourself, Counselor.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: Why? What's▣※so ▣bad about it?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: What about▣white lies? □※□Are those bad?※
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: ※Is there no possible scenario where※there would be a good▣□reason for lying▣□?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sin

adviseScripts.text: Sin and I have a discussion about lying.
